name: perl-context-preserve

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
Run code after a subroutine call, preserving the context the subroutine
would have seen if it were the last statement in the caller

dependencies.name: perl
dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.

dependent_to.name: perl-dbix-class
dependent_to.description: Extensible and flexible object <-> relational mapper.
